thumbnails-behind-icons.description: Whether to display a thumbnail behind icons

all-workspaces-mode.description: Whether to display windows from all workspaces, or just windows from the active workspace

vertical-alignment.description: Where to display the window switcher

display-thumbnail-headers.description: Whether to display thumbnail headers, showing the window icon and title

display-origin-arrow.description: Whether to display a small arrow, below the icon, to indicate the window you came from

compact-labels.description: Whether to display the window title in a single-row label
